name: Wicked Wardrobe - India's Biggest Halloween Party at Sunburn Union
about: Unleash your wicked side at Wicked Wardrobe, India’s largest Halloween party at Sunburn Union featuring Marino Canal! 🎃🎶 Join us on October 26th and 27th for a Halloween Weekender with two nights of spooky madness. Dress to impress for a chance to win a ₹15,000 cash prize and immerse yourself in hauntingly good vibes with curated drinks, a special spooky menu, and hypnotic beats by Marino Canal. 🕯️🕷️ Don't miss out on this ultimate night of thrills, chills, and unforgettable music starting at 7:30 PM. It's time to own the night - see you there! 🖤

Chandan Shetty also emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss Kannada Season 5, showcasing his talent and strong presence in the industry.
